channel.title: Real Estate on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Real Estate on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Real Estate Speculators Are Swooping In to Buy Disaster-Hit Homes
item.description: “We buy homes” companies are procuring disaster-damaged properties for cheap. Survivors say they’re taking advantage of tragedy.

item.title: Real Estate Speculators Are Swooping In to Buy Disaster-Hit Homes
item.description: “We buy homes” companies are procuring disaster-damaged properties for cheap. Survivors say they’re taking advantage of tragedy.

item.title: NeueHouse, Members Club That Catered to Hollywood Creatives, Says It Will Shut Down
item.description: The members club and co-working space, with locations in Los Angeles and New York, said that its last day of operations will be Friday, after which it will file for bankruptcy.

item.title: NeueHouse, Members Club That Catered to Hollywood Creatives, Says It Will Shut Down
item.description: The members club and co-working space, with locations in Los Angeles and New York, said that its last day of operations will be Friday, after which it will file for bankruptcy.

item.title: Mark Zuckerberg Is Expanding His Secretive Hawaii Compound. Part of It Sits Atop a Burial Ground
item.description: Meta’s CEO has become one of the biggest landowners in Hawaii, growing his property’s footprint and erecting new mysterious buildings.
